definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Does the president actually think in these tough-guy slogans?
sentences.chinese: 总统的思维方式真的就像硬汉们的口号吗？

sentences.english: "He (Horford) was the guy; there wasnteven a question, " Harris said.
sentences.chinese: “他是一个硬汉，这似乎毫无疑问，”哈里斯说到。

sentences.english: Hard Corps is the only way I know.
sentences.chinese: 硬汉团杀身成仁我牢记。

sentences.english: He is tough，but I am even tougher.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个硬汉子，不过我要比他更硬。

sentences.english: The Hemingwayian tough man spirit lightens the literary arena in the whole world in an era.
sentences.chinese: 海明威式的硬汉精神照亮了一个时代的世界文坛。

sentences.english: It was a place that melted inhibitions and tough-guy exteriors.
sentences.chinese: 这是一片能化解压抑和硬汉外表的土地。

sentences.english: Hemingway portrays many "the dauntless man" image.
sentences.chinese: 海明威塑造出许多“硬汉子”的形象。

sentences.english: "He (Horford) was the guy; there wasn't even a question, " Harris said.
sentences.chinese: “他是一个硬汉，这仿佛毫无疑问，”哈里斯说到。

sentences.english: Those are certainly possessed of dauntless courage.
sentences.chinese: 那些都是天不怕地不怕的硬汉子。

sentences.english: He is tough, but I am even tougher.
sentences.chinese: 他是个硬汉子，不过我比他更硬。

definition: (coll.) piece of light artillery such as a mortar/(fig.) person who speaks boldly and frankly/hot hatch (car)/(also used figuratively with various meanings in other contexts)
a man who is family-oriented, considerate and protective
